itunes:summary:
China is threatening to shoot down Nancy Pelosi's plane if she tries to visit Taiwan, Joe Biden has COVID again after taking Paxlovid, Russia released an incredible (and real) video urging people to move there, and a video shows an ATF agent quickly goes from tough guy to crying little girl when local police show up to stop him from violating a gun owner's constitutional rights.
